title: Check, change or cancel your instructor theory test

details.description: Check, change or cancel your approved driving instructor (ADI), large goods vehicle instructor (LGV) or register of post-test motorcycle trainers theory test
details.more_information:
You’ll need your driving licence number.

Data protection

You can read the Data Protection Act 1998 fair processing notice for the Driving Standards Agency (DSA) before you start.

Thereâ€™s a different process to check, change or cancel your instructor theory test in Northern Ireland.
details.introduction: Check, change or cancel your approved driving instructor (ADI) part 1 test, large goods vehicle (LGV) instructor or a register of post-test motorcycle trainers (RPMT) theory test.
details.alternate_methods:
Check, change or cancel by phone

You can check, change or cancel your instructor theory test by calling the DSA helpline.

DSA theory test helpline

Telephone: 0300 200 1122 (English), 0300 200 1133 (Welsh)
Textphone: 0300 200 1166
Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm

details.description: Becoming an instructor, applying for licences, booking tests and rules

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.
